## DateApiObject.addMonths() method

Add months, if count not specified adds 1 month

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addMonths(count?: number): DateApiObject<TDate>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  count | number | Number of months count |

<b>Returns:</b>

[DateApiObject](./datetime.dateapiobject.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt;

Itself for fluent API
